media.description: Live in the heart of Manhattan with this beautiful 3-bedroom apartment that offers stunning city views and luxury amenities.

special.aiDescription: High-rise apartment with skyline views and modern interior finishes.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: Enjoy panoramic city views, cutting-edge smart home tech, and a modern layout ideal for urban living.

media.description: Charming 3-bedroom home in a quiet Plano neighborhood, perfect for families and first-time buyers.

special.aiDescription: Lovely home with a fireplace and spacious backyard ideal for kids and pets.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: Located in a friendly suburban community, this home features a large fenced yard, cozy interior, and excellent access to schools and parks.

media.description: Luxurious beachside villa with private pool, spacious deck, and panoramic ocean views.

special.aiDescription: Stunning Malibu villa steps from the beach with elegant interiors and ocean-facing infinity pool.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: This modern villa is built for ultimate comfort and style, featuring open-plan living spaces, smart home automation, and breathtaking sunset views from nearly every room.

media.description: Modern townhouse in downtown LA, steps from entertainment and culture. Enjoy sunset views, cozy interiors, and a private garage.

special.aiDescription: Contemporary LA townhouse with city views and cozy interiors, ideal for urban professionals or small families.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: This home features a private balcony, modern appliances, and easy access to LA's hottest neighborhoods. It blends functionality with style in the heart of the city.

media.description: Located directly on the bayfront, this exquisite residence stands as a beacon of modern architectural brilliance. Inside, the open-concept layout flows seamlessly from room to room, flooded with natural light and anchored by a gourmet chef’s kitchen. Premium finishes like marble flooring, custom cabinetry, and a glass staircase elevate every corner of the home. The exterior boasts a stunning outdoor kitchen, a sun-soaked terrace with ocean views, and a direct path to the water’s edge. Just minutes from downtown attractions, top-rated schools, and fine dining, this is a rare opportunity to own a slice of San Diego’s coastal elegance.

special.aiDescription: This harborfront luxury residence offers a breathtaking coastal living experience in the heart of San Diego. Wake up each morning to panoramic water views, high-end modern finishes, and expansive indoor and outdoor entertainment spaces. With over 4,000 square feet of living space, this home is a testament to luxury design and cutting-edge amenities, perfect for both everyday living and unforgettable gatherings.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: Experience the ultimate in coastal elegance with this stunning home featuring state-of-the-art smart home technology and exquisite indoor/outdoor living areas. The property boasts a private marina access and is located near premier shopping and dining districts.

media.description: Set against the breathtaking backdrop of the Rockies, this home is a sanctuary for nature lovers and those seeking tranquility without sacrificing luxury.

special.aiDescription: This rustic chic mountain retreat offers a warm and inviting escape amidst Aspen’s natural landscape with luxury and comfort.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: The cabin features handcrafted woodwork, vaulted ceilings, and large windows framing stunning mountain views. Outside, enjoy a spacious deck with a hot tub and fire pit perfect for entertaining.

media.description: A stunning suburban estate featuring spacious rooms, modern design, and lush landscaping perfect for family living.

special.aiDescription: This elegant suburban estate combines classic architecture with modern amenities, perfect for sophisticated family living in a sought-after neighborhood.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: Step into this exquisite home with its warm, inviting interiors and meticulously maintained landscaping. The gourmet kitchen is a chef’s dream, featuring premium appliances and ample storage. Relax by the cozy fireplace or entertain guests in the expansive backyard with a sparkling pool and patio area. Located in a friendly community with top-rated schools and convenient access to city amenities, this home offers the perfect balance of luxury and comfort.

media.description: A breathtaking modern villa with floor-to-ceiling glass walls offering panoramic views of Lake Tahoe, complete with luxury amenities and eco-friendly design.

special.aiDescription: Experience refined lakeside living in this glass-fronted modern villa nestled on the tranquil shores of Lake Tahoe. Boasting panoramic water and mountain views, the home's floor-to-ceiling glass walls invite natural light throughout its spacious open-plan interiors. Smart technology is integrated into every facet of this residence, from climate and lighting control to security and entertainment. This architectural marvel blends seamlessly with its surroundings, providing a unique sanctuary that is both elegant and eco-conscious.
special.moreTextAboutThePlace: The Lakeside Modern Glass Villa redefines luxury with sustainability, blending world-class comfort with the calming influence of nature. Designed by a renowned architect, every angle of this home captures a dramatic vista — whether it's sunrise over the lake or the serene twilight reflected off water. Multiple terraces offer private nooks for relaxation, while the heated infinity-edge pool seems to flow into the lake itself. A state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen, a custom wine cellar, and a home theater create spaces for unforgettable experiences. Positioned in a gated enclave just minutes from ski resorts and hiking trails, this estate is ideal for those seeking adventure without leaving luxury behind.

basic.title: Tahoe Island Dr, South Lake Tahoe
